Welcome to Path Of Building API's documentation!
================================================

For installation and basic usage, see the `README.md <https://github.com/ppoelzl/PathOfBuildingAPI/blob/master/README.md>`_ in the project root.

API Capabilities
----------------

For a detailed overview of what data can be extracted from Path of Building import codes, see :doc:`api_capabilities`.

Calculation Architecture
--------------------------

To understand how Path of Building performs calculations and how our API extracts the results, see :doc:`calculation_architecture`.
